content: I'm thinking of trying a different type of flour for my sourdough shortcake.  I've been experimenting with different types of flour lately, and I've been loving the results. I made a batch of cookies with bread flour, and they turned out chewier than usual. I've also been using oat flour to make pancakes and waffles, and it gives them a nice nutty flavor. Do you think I could use oat flour or bread flour for my sourdough shortcake?
